sudoku_p module¶

class sudoku: this is a class to solve SUDOKU puzzles

class sudoku_p.sudoku(board)[source]¶

Bases: object

A class to represent a SUDOKU board and to solve it

function to reduce candidate list by algorithms for doubles, tripples, hidden doubles used by getAllRowCandidates(), getAllColCandidates(), getAllBoxCandidates()

setDebugLevel(level)[source]¶

set the debug level (0 … no additional printouts, 1 … do debug printing, >1 … reserved for future use)
